# Contributing Guide

## 1. Setup

```bash
git clone https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan.git
cd react-scan
pnpm install
```

## 2. Run dev build

```bash
pnpm run dev
```

## 3. Run test environment

```bash
cd packages/kitchen-sink
pnpm run dev
```

Go to http://localhost:5175 to see the test environment.
